Package com.buffettinc.hrms.service.pto

Interface PTOCalendarService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PTOCalendarServiceImpl
public interface PTOCalendarService
This interface defines the services associated with the PTOCalendar object. The PTOCalendar contains a collection of all PTORequests for each EmployeeID.
Since:
2023-07-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
IST 412 Group 5

    • saveOrUpdatePTOCalendar

      PTOCalendar saveOrUpdatePTOCalendar(PTOCalendar ptoCalendar)
      Save or update a PTOCalendar object.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the saved or updated PTOCalendar

    • getPTOCalendarById

      PTOCalendar getPTOCalendarById(UUID calendarID)
      Retrieve a PTOCalendar by its ID.
      Parameters:
      calendarID - the UUID of the PTOCalendar
      Returns:
      the PTOCalendar with the provided ID or null if not found

    • getAllPTOCalendars

      List<PTOCalendar> getAllPTOCalendars()
      Retrieve all existing PTOCalendar objects.
      Returns:
      a list of all PTOCalendars

    • addPTORequest

      Add a PTORequest to a specific PTOCalendar.
      Parameters:
      calendarID - the UUID of the PTOCalendar
      employeeID - the UUID of the Employee
      request - the PTORequest to add

    • removePTORequest

      Parameters:
      calendarID - the UUID of the PTOCalendar
      employeeID - the UUID of the Employee
      request - the PTORequest to remove

    • updatePTORequest

      void updatePTORequest(UUID calendarID, UUID employeeID, PTORequest previousRequest, PTORequest newRequest)
      Update a PTORequest in a specific PTOCalendar.
      Parameters:
      calendarID - the UUID of the PTOCalendar
      employeeID - the UUID of the Employee
      previousRequest - the PTORequest to update
      newRequest - the updated PTORequest
